title: 1 1/2" (38 mm) Snap On Non-Leather Jean Belt
features: 1 1/2" wide belt strap fits most jeans.

Sizing: belt size is measured from inside edge of buckle to the center hole. Order about 2 inches larger than pants size for best fit, e.g. 26"-27" pants order XS 29"; 28"-30" pants order S/M 32"; 32"-34" pants order M/L 36"; 36"-38" pants order L/XL 40"
description: *Material: Non leather, leather like - animal free material *Square buckle: made of zinc alloy *Width of belt: 1 1/2" (38 mm) *Size Chart: |Size XS - 27"~29"; |End to End: 34"|Fits waist measurement of about 27" to 29" |Size S/M - 30"~32"; |End to End: 37"|Fits waist measurement of about 30" to 32" |Size M/L - 34"~36"; |End to End: 41"|Fits waist measurement of about 34" to 36" |Size L/XL - 38"~40"; |End to End: 45"|Fits waist measurement of about 38" to 40" |Size 1 X - 42"~44"; |End to End: 49"|Fits waist measurement of about 42" to 44" Notes: the size chart does not include buckle length. There are total of five holes, 1" apart. It is recommended to select size range that is about 2" larger than pants size.
